external_references.description: Microsoft. (2010, August 12). More information about the DLL Preloading remote attack vector. Retrieved December 5, 2014.

external_references.source_name: Microsoft Dynamic Link Library Search Order
external_references.description: Microsoft. (2018, May 31). Dynamic-Link Library Search Order. Retrieved November 30, 2014.

objects.description: Disallow loading of remote DLLs. This is included by default in Windows Server 2012+ and is available by patch for XP+ and Server 2003+.(Citation: Microsoft More information about DLL) Enable Safe DLL Search Mode to move the user's current folder later in the search order. This is included by default in modern versions of Windows; the associated Windows Registry key is located at HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\SafeDLLSearchMode.(Citation: Microsoft Dynamic Link Library Search Order)
